Text:
when it says "in english and japanese audio" is that like you can change it or half of it is in english and the other half is in japanese?

also are the subtitles on all the time or can you turn them off? cheers

If you are using Vlc right click and go to audio click on Trak English For English Audio or Japanese FOr japanese AUdio
The subs can be On or off just go to subs option and Disable them
